questions.question: Choose the correct answer </br> i) All work done on the specimen is stored in form of strain energy</br>ii) Part of energy is wasted in form of heat and sound

answers.a: i) plastic stage ii) elastic stage
answers.b: i) semisolid stage ii) plastic stage
answers.d: i) elastic stage ii) plastic stage

questions.question: Significant necking was found to occur in a tensile test piece. Examine the areas indicated on stress/strain curve and indicate where necking of specimen has occurred.
Following statement in relation to young's modulus are correct with exception of

answers.a: It is the measure of resistance to elastic deformation
answers.b: Equal to constant E identified in Hooke's law
answers.c: It is the measure of resistance to plastic deformation
answers.d: It is the measure of modulus of stiffness

questions.question: Which mechanical property of the material is indicated by the total area under a stress strain curve
